message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $12,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your counteroffer, but the value of this product is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. How about we split the difference and I pay $9,250?
